name: SynergillAssistant
0:
”Alexa open synergill assistant”
”send me product inventory”
”I need product inventory report”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: synergill assistant
des: This voice assistant allows performing day-to-day tasks with help of Alexa. Users can generate reports, find invoice dues, place orders.
